item.title: 耐克将公布自 COVID 以来最大幅度的销售下滑，分析师预计目标将重新设定
item.description: 投资者和分析师预计，耐克将在本周二发布季度财报时下调年度预期，这是该公司自本月初宣布新任首席执行官以来发布的首份财报。【原文：Investors and analysts expect Nike to lower annual forecasts on Tuesday when it posts quarterly results, the company's first earnings report since announcing a new CEO earlier this month.】

item.title: 因需求和欧佩克不确定性，石油预测连续第五个月下调
item.description: 路透社周一的一项民意调查显示，分析师连续第五个月下调了2024年的油价预期，理由是需求疲软和欧佩克计划的不确定性，尽管存在地缘政治风险，但预计油价仍将承压。【原文：Analysts have cut their 2024 oil price forecasts for a fifth consecutive month, citing weaker demand and uncertainty over OPEC’s plans, with prices expected to remain under pressure despite geopolitical risks, a Reuters poll found on Monday.】

item.title: 欧洲汽车制造商因需求疲软、成本上升而发出利润预警
item.description: 欧洲汽车制造商斯泰兰特周一与更大的竞争对手大众汽车和其他公司一道，就汽车需求前景恶化和成本上升发出警告，使该行业的市值减少了数十亿欧元。【原文：European carmaker Stellantis joined on Monday bigger rival Volkswagen and others in warning about the worsening outlook for auto demand and rising costs, wiping billions of euros off the sector's market value.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，Verizon 接近达成向 Vertical Bridge 出售通信塔的交易
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周一援引知情人士的话报道，威瑞森通信公司（Verizon Communications）正在就向数字基础设施公司 Vertical Bridge 出售数千个移动电话塔进行深入谈判。【原文：Verizon Communications is in advanced talks to sell thousands of mobile phone towers to digital infrastructure firm Vertical Bridge, Bloomberg News reported on Monday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 早间新闻鲍威尔为第三季度画上句号，中国股市大涨 8
item.description: Mike Dolan 展望美国和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan】

item.title: 美国将公布更多太阳能关税两项决定中的第一项
item.description: 美国贸易官员本周可能会对来自东南亚四国的太阳能电池板征收新的关税，美国制造商曾抱怨这些国家采用了不公平的补贴措施，使美国产品缺乏竞争力。【原文：U.S. trade officials this week may impose new tariffs on solar panels from four Southeast Asian nations that American manufacturers have complained employ unfair subsidies that make U.S. products uncompetitive.】

item.title: 必和必拓预计 2035 年前铜需求每年将增长 100 万吨
item.description: 澳大利亚矿业公司必和必拓预计，由于采用铜密集型技术，到 2035 年，全球平均每年将多消耗 100 万吨铜，比过去 15 年的年增长率高出一倍。【原文：Australian miner BHP expects the world to consume an extra 1 million metric tons of copper per year on average until 2035 due to the adoption of copper-intensive technologies, double the annual volume growth in the past 15 years.】

item.title: AT&T 以 76 亿美元向 TPG 出售 DirecTV 70% 的股份
item.description: AT&T 周一表示，它将以 76 亿美元的价格向私募股权公司 TPG 出售其在卫星电视服务 DirecTV 中持有的 70% 股份，从而退出这项对这家电信运营商来说以分配额下降为标志的业务。【原文：AT&T said on Monday it would sell its 70% stake in satellite TV service DirecTV to private equity firm TPG for $7.6 billion, exiting a business marked by declining distributions for the telecom operator.】

item.title: 投资者连续第五周抛售美国股票基金
item.description: 截至9月25日，投资者连续第五周减持美国股票基金，原因是对经济健康状况的担忧挥之不去，以及在美国总统大选前的谨慎态度。【原文：Investors reduced holdings in U.S. equity funds for the fifth consecutive week through Sept. 25, driven by lingering concerns about the economy's health and caution ahead of the U.S. presidential election.】

item.title: 斯特兰蒂斯发出警告后，欧洲汽车股损失 100 亿美元
item.description: 欧洲汽车股周一暴跌近 4%，此前斯太尔、大众汽车和阿斯顿汽车发出的预警再次引发了市场对该行业在需求放缓和中国激烈竞争的环境下盈利前景的担忧。【原文：European auto stocks tumbled almost 4% on Monday after a warning from Stellantis, Volkswagen and Aston rekindled concerns over the sector's earnings outlook in a year marred by slowing demand and aggressive Chinese competition.】

item.title: 聚焦：波音供应商担心罢工会长期影响就业
item.description: 波音公司为期两周的罢工迫使航空航天供应商开拓者制造公司（Pathfinder Manufacturing）解雇了公司 54 名员工中的 14 名，公司首席执行官戴夫-特雷德（Dave Trader）担心，如果罢工持续下去，他可能需要让更多的员工回家。【原文：Boeing's two-week-old strike has forced aerospace supplier Pathfinder Manufacturing to furlough 14 out of the company's 54 employees, and CEO Dave Trader fears he may need to send more home if the stoppage grinds on.】

item.title: 聚焦：摩根大通 "杰米溢价 "面临考验，首席执行官继任迫在眉睫
item.description: 摩根大通首席执行官杰米-戴蒙（Jamie Dimon）的继任者是谁，何时继任，这些问题悬而未决，但分析师和投资者说，有一件事几乎可以肯定：当这位强势的银行总裁最终离任时，摩根大通的股价将会下滑。【原文：Questions hang over who will succeed JPMorgan Chase CEO Jamie Dimon and when, but analysts and investors say one thing is almost certain: the bank's stock will slump when the powerful bank chief eventually departs.】

item.title: 投资者谨慎促使全球货币市场基金流入
item.description: 由于投资者对美国经济的健康状况持谨慎态度，并担心今年进一步降息可能预示着更严重的经济问题，全球货币市场基金出现了近六个月来最高的单周流入量。【原文：Global money market funds experienced their highest weekly inflows in nearly six months, with investors cautious about the health of the U.S. economy and concerned that further rate cuts this year could signal deeper economic troubles.】

item.title: DNeX 与谷歌云签署多年协议，在马来西亚提供主权云服务
item.description: 马来西亚技术公司 Dagang NeXchange Berhad（DNeX）和谷歌云（Google Cloud）周一宣布达成一项多年协议，在该国提供主权云服务。【原文：Malaysian technology firm Dagang NeXchange Berhad (DNeX) and Google Cloud on Monday announced a multi-year deal to provide sovereign cloud services in the country.】

item.title: Epic Games 指责三星和谷歌计划封杀应用程序竞争对手
item.description: "堡垒之夜》视频游戏制造商 Epic Games 周一指控 Alphabet 旗下的谷歌和全球最大的安卓手机制造商三星合谋保护谷歌的 Play 商店免受竞争。【原文：“Fortnite” video game maker Epic Games on Monday accused Alphabet’s Google and Samsung , the world’s largest Android phone manufacturer, of conspiring to protect Google’s Play store from competition.】

item.title: 德国各州通胀率表明 9 月份全国通胀率将进一步下降
item.description: 周一的初步数据显示，9 月份德国多个重要州的通胀率有所下降，这表明全国通胀率也将进一步下降。【原文：Inflation eased across a raft of key German states in September, preliminary data showed on Monday, suggesting that the national inflation rate would also decrease further.】

item.title: 美国东海岸港口罢工迫在眉睫，周二仍未安排谈判
item.description: 美国东海岸和墨西哥湾沿岸的港口工人将于周一午夜举行罢工，目前还没有谈判计划，罢工有可能导致从缅因州到德克萨斯州的集装箱运输中断，每天经济损失高达 50 亿美元。【原文：U.S. East and Gulf Coast port workers are set to go on strike at midnight on Monday with no talks currently scheduled to head off a stoppage threatening to halt container traffic from Maine to Texas and cost the economy as much as $5 billion a day.】

item.title: 中国投资者恐错过史诗级反弹而匆忙入市
item.description: 在中国政府政策红利的刺激下，以及害怕错过一些人眼中的历史性涨势的恐惧驱使下，投资者纷纷涌入股市，动物精神重回中国股市。【原文：Animal spirits are back in China's stock market as investors rush into equities, galvanized by Beijing's policy bonanza and driven by fear of missing out on what some see as a rally of historic intensity.】

item.title: KKR 支持的马来西亚电信基础设施集团 OMS 将重新考虑 IPO 计划
item.description: 马来西亚电信基础设施和海底电缆服务公司 OMS 集团高层表示，该集团将在未来几年内重新考虑首次公开募股计划，不排除在国内证券交易所上市的可能性。【原文：Malaysian telecom infrastructure and subsea cable services company OMS Group will revisit its plan for an initial public offering in the next few years and is not ruling out a listing on the domestic stock exchange, its top executive said.】

item.title: 中国 "不朽 "消费刺激计划之后，痛苦的政策选择迫在眉睫
item.description: 中国为实现 2024 年经济增长目标而实施的刺激消费计划打破了几十年来的政策模式，但要使家庭需求而非投资成为可持续发展的驱动力，这是一条漫长而充满艰难抉择的道路。【原文：China's stimulus plans to fill consumer pockets to meet its 2024 growth target breaks away from a decades-old policy playbook, but making household demand a sustainable driver of development instead of investment is a long path paved with tough choices.】

item.title: 阿斯顿-马丁警告称利润因供应链和中国困境而下降
item.description: 英国豪华汽车制造商阿斯顿-马丁（Aston Martin）周一以供应链中断和中国市场疲软为由，警告年度核心利润下降，并表示不再期望上半年实现正的自由现金流。【原文：British luxury carmaker Aston Martin on Monday warned of lower annual core profit and said it no longer expects to achieve positive free cash flow in the first half, citing supply chain disruptions and weakness in China.】

item.title: 亚洲跨境并购复苏，交易商放眼海外寻求增长
item.description: 今年，涉及亚太地区企业的跨国并购有所复苏，在日本更是蓬勃发展，因为企业在适应利率上升后寻求新的增长点。【原文：Cross-border mergers and acquisitions involving companies in the Asia-Pacific region have recovered this year and are booming in Japan as businesses seek new growth after adjusting to cope with higher interest rates.】

item.title: Stellantis 发布利润预警，原因是全球市场和中国市场的竞争
item.description: Stellantis NV 周一下调了其指导目标，理由是全球行业动态恶化和中国在电动汽车方面的竞争等因素。【原文：Stellantis NV revised on Monday its guidance downward, citing a deterioration in global industry dynamics and Chinese competition on electric vehicles among other factors.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称，字节跳动计划使用华为芯片训练新的人工智能模型
item.description: TikTok 的中国母公司字节跳动计划开发一个人工智能模型，主要使用华为技术公司（HWT.UL）的芯片进行训练，三位熟悉内情的人士表示，美国的禁令让这家社交媒体巨头转向国内寻找芯片。【原文：TikTok's Chinese parent ByteDance plans to develop an AI model trained primarily with chips from compatriot Huawei Technologies (HWT.UL), said three people familiar with the matter, as U.S. curbs turn the social media giant homeward in search of chips.】

item.title: 中国股市在刺激经济的欢呼声中将迎来近十年来最好的一个月
item.description: 周一，随着中国政府推出进一步的刺激措施以遏制整体经济的放缓，中国股市延续了强劲的涨势，内地股市更是创下了近十年来的最佳表现。【原文：Chinese stocks extended a blistering rally on Monday with those in the mainland headed for their best month in almost a decade, as Beijing rolled out further stimulus measures to arrest a slowdown in the broad economy.】

item.title: 美联储鲍威尔将发表讲话，经济学家担心政策失误和选举风险
item.description: 在美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）即将于周一发表讲话之际发布的一项对经济学家的最新调查显示，美国央行在通胀之战的最后阶段设定利率时出现失误是明年可能削弱经济的主要风险。【原文：A mistake by the U.S. central bank in setting interest rates during the last phase of its inflation battle is the main risk that could undercut the economy over the next year, according to a new survey of economists released as Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell was set to speak on Monday.】

item.title: 美国股市涨幅扩大凸显对经济的乐观情绪
item.description: 更多股票参与了 S&P 500 指数创纪录新高的进程，缓解了人们对 2024 年大部分时间里涨势集中在少数巨型科技公司的担忧。【原文：More stocks are participating in the S&P 500’s latest march to record highs, easing concerns over a rally that has been concentrated in a handful of giant technology names for much of 2024.】

item.title: 早间竞价日经指数回落，中国反弹
item.description: 韦恩-科尔对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望。【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Wayne Cole.】

item.title: 刺激经济呼声高涨，中国工厂和服务业下滑
item.description: 中国 9 月份的工厂活动连续第五个月萎缩，而服务业则大幅放缓，这表明在今年仅剩三个月的时间里，中国需要更多的刺激措施来实现 2024 年的经济增长目标。【原文：China's factory activity in September shrank for a fifth straight month while the services sector slowed sharply, suggesting even more stimulus is needed to hit Beijing's 2024 growth target with only three months left in the year.】

item.title: 财新PMI显示中国服务业活动放缓
item.description: 周一的一项私营部门调查显示，中国 9 月份服务业活动扩张放缓，新业务增长创下近一年来最弱纪录，尽管出口仍在加速增长。【原文：China's services activity expansion slowed in September as new business growth hit its weakest in nearly a year even as exports sped up, a private-sector survey showed on Monday.】
